text: Nɨ oragh. Datɨrɨghɨn dughiar kamra, Ikiavɨra Itir God nɨ isɨ nan dafarim datɨgham. Eghtɨ kɨ nɨ mɨsuegh nɨn dapanim atugham. Egh e ian mɨdorozir gumazibav suegh, men namnaba isɨ kuarazir isaba ko asɨzir atiabar anɨngam. Kɨ kamaghɨn damightɨ, kantribar gumazamiziba bar kamaghɨn fogham, Israelian God, a guizbangɨra God.
